item.title: Lost 4x05
item.author: julio@meroh.net (Julio Merino)
item.description:
Watched episode 5 from season 4, titled The Constant, yesterday night.  As a couple of friends put it: "Best. Episode. Ever."  Let's hope this trend doesn't end here!

3 more left to catch up.
